PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
- Object Oriented PHP Developer
- Project management and supervisory experience, Scrum, Agile
- Linux server managament
- PHP, Node.js, MVC, Git / Subversion toolset, Docker, Drush, Drupal console
- CMS: Drupal 7, Drupal 8, Magento 1.9
- Framework: Yii , CodeIgniter, Laravel, Zend, Nodejs(exrepss)
- Database: Database design, MS SQL, My SQL, Oracle, MongoDB
- Front-end: Jquery, HTML, CSS, Reactjs, Bootstrap
- Tools: Photosop, Netbean, Sublimetext, Smartgit,..
- Others: AWS EC2, Restful API, Linux, Amazon API, Digital Ocean, Facebook APIs, Google APIs
WORK EXPERIENCE
Aleph Labs, BangKok
2017 — Present
Senior Full Stack Developer
- Participating in the full development lifecycle, including architecture, design,
development.
- Developed mock server used Node.js
- Work with third-parties involved with application development
- Mainly using Drupal 8 to developed websites (Using Views, custom module, custom
theme, Restful API , ..)
- Used Drush, Docker, GIT, Bitbucket
- Used agile and scrum methodologies to develop Drupal applications.
- Setup Ubuntu, CentOS server, Nginx, Apache, PHP, MySQL...
- Support Junior team members 
DBIZ Group, Ho Chi Minh
2014 — 2016
PHP Team Leader
- Created and developed new site capabilities and features
- Work on Drupal, Magento, Laravel front and back end development, along with
theming.
- Developed and maintained websites based on Drupal, Magento and Laravel
- Worked with Google API, Facebook API
- Coordinate with project manager to estimate.
- Setup Ubuntu, Centos server as well as Memcache, Nginx, Apache, ...
- Code review 
SutrixMedia, Ho Chi Minh
2011 — 2013
